SELECT user.driver_phone, rel.driver_id, rel.car_id, user.license_id, car.vehicle_no FROM driver_car_binding_relationship rel INNER JOIN driver_user user ON rel.driver_id = USER.id INNER JOIN car ON car.id = rel.car_id WHERE rel.bind_state = #{bindState} AND rel.car_id = #{carId} LIMIT 1
